thread.title: 10 Bands for \$10 - Where will Winter Jam 2016...
thread.title_full: 10 Bands for \$10 - Where will Winter Jam 2016...

title: 10 Bands for \$10 - Where will Winter Jam 2016...

organizations.name: mi the palace of auburn hills

text:
By Kim Jones Updated January 23, 2017 . 
The most popular annual Christian music tour, Winter Jam, kicked off the 2017 year on January 6 in Charleston, West Virginia. With a total of 46 shows, the tour runs through April 2, where it ends in Tulsa, Oklahoma. 
Featuring Crowder , Britt Nicole, Tenth Avenue North, Sadie Robertson, Thousand Foot Krutch, Andy Mineo, Colton Dixon, Newsong , Tony Nolan, OBB, Sarah Reeves, and Steven Malcolm, this concert event is a wonderful way to start the year and probably will be the best $10 you ever spent! 
Fans of rock, worship, rap and pop/contemporary will all find plenty to love about the line-up. 
As always, tickets will be $10 at the door with no advance ticket sales. Winter Jam 2017 Schedule January 6, 2017 - Charleston, WV Charleston Civic Center January 7, 2017 - Louisville, KY Freedom Hall January 8, 2017 - Grand Rapids, MI Van Andel Arena January 13, 2017 - Jacksonville, FL Jacksonville Veterans Memorial Arena January 14, 2017 - Tampa, FL Amalie Arena (f. Tampa Bay Times Forum)
